nodes.text: The Wait a Minute was a Corellian CC-7700/E interdiction cruiser in the New Republic's Rapid Response Task Force and the Mandalorian Protectors. The Wait a Minute was captained by Jav Patrell.
In 5 ABY, the Wait a Minute participated in the Battle of Mindor, where it was destroyed when waves of TIE Interceptors on a suicide run rammed the Wait a Minute's hull.
